title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.371 - Service lines: steel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.371 - Service lines: steel

State Regulations

Each steel service line to be operated at less than 100
psig (689 Kpa) must be constructed of pipe designed for a minimum of 100 psig
(689 kPa). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.371

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
